name.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・精錬編(低)

description.en: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ar: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.br: Diminui o atributo ao invés de destruir o equipamento durante o fortalecimento. Para usar, coloque o pergaminho na caixa apropriada no menu de Fortalecimento antes de iniciar a tentativa de aprimoramento. O pergaminho é consumido no processo.
description.cns: 精炼失败物品不会消失，但是精炼等级会下降。使用前请将卷轴放到对应的精炼栏中，卷轴在精炼过程中会被消耗掉。
description.de: Das Upgrade der Waffe sinkt wenn das Upgrade fehlschlägt.
description.fi: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fil: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fr: Diminue l'attribut au lieu de détruire l'équipement lors de l'amélioration. Pour l'utiliser, placez le parchemin dans la case appropriée du menu d'amélioration avant de tenter la mise à niveau. Le parchemin est consommé dans le processus.
description.id: Mengurangi atribut alih-alih menghancurkan peralatan saat meningkatkan. Untuk menggunakan, tempatkan gulir di kotak yang sesuai pada Menu Upgrade sebelum mencoba upgrade. Gulungan dikonsumsi dalam proses.
description.it: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.jp: 精錬失敗時にアイテムを破壊しないが、精錬度(+値)は減少します。使用には、精錬メニューの適切な位置へ巻物をセットします。巻物は強化中に消費されます。（通称: SProtect Low）
description.nl: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.pl: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ru: Снижает вероятность неудачи при попытке усилить снаряжение.
description.sp: Disminuye el nivel en lugar de destruir el equipo al fracasar en la mejora. Para usarlo, coloca el pergamino en la casilla correspondiente del Menú de Mejora antes de intentar la mejora. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
description.sw: Decreases attribute instead of destroying the equipment while upgrading. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.th: ลดคุณสมบัติแทนที่จะทำลายอุปกรณ์ขณะอัพเกรด ในการใช้งาน ให้วางคัมภีร์ไปที่กล่องที่เหมาะสมบนเมนูอัพเกรดก่อนที่จะพยายามอัพเกรด
description.tw: 精鍊前需先使用卷軸，精鍊失敗時，物品不會消失，但是精鍊等級會下降
description.vi: Giảm thuộc tính thay vì phá hủy trang bị khi nâng cấp. Để sử dụng, hãy đặt cuộn vào ô thích hợp trên Menu Nâng cấp trước khi thử nâng cấp. Cuộn giấy được sử dụng trong quá trình này.
